sentences.en: ...standards of morality and justice in society.
A morality that condones such bloodshed is totally unacceptalbe to me.
sentences.cn: 宽恕这种杀戮的道德是我完全不能接受的.

sentences.en: And such is his responsibility by every standard of conscience and morality.
sentences.cn: 以每一种良心和道德标准来看,这都是他的责任.

sentences.en: And the justice of morality must and will win in the end.
sentences.cn: 道德的制裁最后必须而且一定胜利.

sentences.en: He has overthrown the basic standards of morality.
sentences.cn: 他已摒弃了基本的道德标准.

sentences.en: Here, morality and good sentiments clash headlong.
sentences.cn: 在这个问题上，道德和良知互不相容。

sentences.en: If there was morality in law they should equate.
sentences.cn: 如果法律包括道义的话,两者应当是等同的.

sentences.en: It is not possible to dissociate art from morality, politics and religion.
sentences.cn: 不可能把艺术和道德 、 政治和宗教分离.

sentences.en: It is revolting to our idea of morality.
sentences.cn: 这违反我们的道德观念.

sentences.en: Jacelin is a person of strict morality.
sentences.cn: 杰斯林是个品行极其端正的人.

sentences.en: Morality was the emphasis of his speech.
The authorities are protectors of public morality.
sentences.cn: 当权者是公众道德的捍卫者。

sentences.en: the decline in standards of personal morality
The essential element in the mores and in personal morality is consistency.
sentences.cn: 民风民德,以及个人道德中首要的因素是其连贯性.

sentences.en: The founders of our religion made this a cornerstone of morality.
sentences.cn: 我们宗教的创始人把这看作是道德的基石.

sentences.en: This renders all breaches of morality before marriage very uncommon.
sentences.cn: 这样一来,婚前败坏道德的事就少见了.

sentences.en: War turns morality inside out: killing and cruelty are virtues.
sentences.cn: 战争颠倒是非：杀戮与残忍成了美德。

sentences.en: Where was the room for an absolute or a conventional morality?
sentences.cn: 哪有什么绝对的或者一成不变的美德?
